author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

 * move code out of \test to \plugins
 * migrate away from ES get
 * modernize ED Analyzers
 * change `std::cout` to `edm:LogPrint`
 * remove unused packages (e.g. `CPEGenericErrorParm` has been superseded by the GenErrors)

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, `scramv1 b runtests`  pass

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, and no backport is needed

cc: @mmusich @ferencek @OzAmram @SanjanaSekhar
title: Modernize SiPixel CPE object code in `CondTools/SiPixel`
